org.bouncycastle.util

Interface Memoable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GeneralDigest, GOST3411_2012_256Digest, GOST3411_2012_512Digest, GOST3411_2012Digest, GOST3411Digest, LongDigest, MD2Digest, MD4Digest, MD5Digest, RIPEMD128Digest, RIPEMD160Digest, RIPEMD256Digest, RIPEMD320Digest, SHA1Digest, SHA224Digest, SHA256Digest, SHA384Digest, SHA512Digest, SHA512tDigest, SkeinDigest, SkeinEngine, SM3Digest, TigerDigest, WhirlpoolDigest

    public interface Memoable
    Interface for Memoable objects. Memoable objects allow the taking of a snapshot of their internal state via the copy() method and then reseting the object back to that state later using the reset() method.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Memoable copy()
      Produce a copy of this object with its configuration and in its current state.
      void reset(Memoable other)
      Restore a copied object state into this object.

    • Method Detail

      • copy

        Memoable copy()
        Produce a copy of this object with its configuration and in its current state.

        The returned object may be used simply to store the state, or may be used as a similar object starting from the copied state.

      • reset

        void reset(Memoable other)
        Restore a copied object state into this object.

        Implementations of this method should try to avoid or minimise memory allocation to perform the reset.

        Parameters:
        other - an object originally copied from an object of the same type as this instance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassCastException - if the provided object is not of the correct type.
        MemoableResetException - if the other parameter is in some other way invalid.
